original_text: Someone told Saul that David was now at Keilah. Saul said, ‘God has now put David under my power. David has gone into a town that has high walls and strong gates. He will not be able to leave that place.’
korean_text: 다윗이 그일라에 온 것을 어떤 사람이 사울에게 알리매 사울이 이르되 하나님이 그를 내 손에 넘기셨도다 그가 문과 문 빗장이 있는 성읍에 들어갔으니 갇혔도다

sentences.original_text: that David was now at Keilah
'God has now put David under my power
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 이제 다윗을 내 권세 아래 두셨다

sentences.original_text: David has gone into a town
that has high walls and strong gates
He will not be able to leave that place'
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그 곳을 떠날 수 없을 것이다'
